post.author: 신민용
post.content:
Hi ANDREW,
Are you available for this role in Downtown Toronto. Please send me your resume if you are looking and I will call you back. Feel free to send it to a colleague if you are not interested.
Salary: 90k to 110k base
Looking for a Technical Specialist who will provide technical leadership to successfully deliver Application Development projects.
Minimum 7 years experience in Information Technology.
Minimum Bachelors degree in Computer Science
Strong Communication skills with both technical and business stakeholders.
Proven Team player that can work closely with Senior Technical Architect and/or Project Manager and implement solutions with minimal supervision.
Minimum 3 years experience in a Technical Lead role with excellent interpersonal skills.
Strong OO Analysis, Design and Development
Strong J2EE
Strong EAI & Relational Database experience
Knowledge of Software Development methodologies (RUP, RAD, etc)
Experience with mid to large projects.
Strong business and IT knowledge and experience in the Financial Industry, Banking, Trading Systems etc.
Other tools and technologies of benefit PL/SQL, Oracle, Struts, Java, UML, Erwin, Rational Rose, Data Warehousing and portal experience.
Asset: .Net experience.
Roy Andrade Alliance Search Group Inc. roy@alliancesearch.net www.alliancesearch.net 416-265-9688
post.title: Technical Specialist
